resps: Developed an AI-powered skincare analysis app with Next.js, React, and TailwindCSS, integrating OpenAI Vision API for image-based skin detection.
Built responsive, multi-step interfaces enhanced with GSAP and Lottie animations, improving engagement and analysis flow.
Implemented reusable component structures and dynamic recommendation cards for a scalable UI.
Optimized performance, reducing load times and ensuring seamless transitions between pages and camera steps.
Integrated backend APIs for real-time analysis and recommendations, enhancing accuracy and usability.
Designed and deployed multiple React and Next.js applications using TailwindCSS, Firebase, and Node.js.
Collaborated on team projects using Git/GitHub, focusing on version control, debugging, and feature implementation.
Applied RESTful API integration and responsive design principles to deliver polished, accessible interfaces.
Developed real-world projects under agile timelines, accumulating over 350 hours of hands-on coding and deployment.
